thread.title: Trump Administration Adds Citizenship Question to 2020 Census

author: Paul Overberg
title: Trump Administration Adds Citizenship Question to 2020 Census
text:
WASHINGTONâ€”The Trump administration said Monday it would ask 2020 Census respondents whether they are U.S. citizens, the first time in decades such a question will be asked on the decennial questionnaire.
The decision, announced in a letter by Commerce Secretary Wilbur Ross, immediately generated strong pushback from Democrats and immigrant groups, who say it will reduce responses from immigrants. 

The...
